short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set custom keyboard shortcuts for buttons or links on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Offboard is a Google Chrome extension that lets you set custom keyboard shortcuts on any website. 

Point to select any clickable element like buttons or links on any website and set a custom keyboard shortcut to trigger it.

Try it live on the website: https://offboard.app
